H0.text: Which national team introduced ‘Total Football’ at the 1974 World Cup in Germany. Brazil

H1.text: Which national team introduced ‘Total Football’ at the 1974 World Cup in Germany. West Germany

H2.text: Which national team introduced ‘Total Football’ at the 1974 World Cup in Germany. Argentina

H3.text: Which national team introduced ‘Total Football’ at the 1974 World Cup in Germany. Holland/Netherlands

A4.text: During the 1970s, the team adopted the Total Football strategy pioneered by Ajax, and led by playmaker Johan Cruyff and national team head coach Rinus Michels.

A5.text: The only team I've seen that did things differently was Holland at the 1974 World Cup in West Germany.
